description: This table contains the audit trail data for deleted anesthesia records.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DELETION_USER_ID
columns.description: Audit item that stores the ID of the user who deleted the anesthesia record.

columns.name: DELETION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Audit item that stores the instant that the anesthesia record was deleted.

columns.name: AN_DEL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Audit item for whether the anesthesia record was hard- or soft-deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Delete


Hard Delete


Undelete
